import axios from "axiosConfig"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Login() { const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm({ }); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const handleLogin = () => { axios.post(config.API_URL + ENUMS.API_ROUTES.AUTH_LOGIN, { ...HttpUtil.adminHttpHeaders(), body: { email: email, password: password } }) .then(res => { }); } return ( <>
Sign in
setEmail(e.target.value)} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} />
e.preventDefault()} className="text-blueGray-200" > Forgot password?
Create new account
); }
